item.title: Github - How to Push Files to a Repository in Terminal
item.description: I’m fairly new to this, so there will be some uncertainties at the moment, but it pretty much includes all I did for mine to work. I’ll come back to this. When it has been setup git add . To add all files in the directory to the next commit. git commit -m "[title of commit]" . Create a commit. git push -u origin main Push/Upload the commits in the queue.
